description: Try our easy to follow Spinach & Feta Gozleme recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spinach & Feta Gozleme Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk yeast, sugar and 1 1/4 cups warm water in a jug until combined. Cover. Stand in a warm place for 5 minutes or until bubbly.
Meanwhile, sift flour into a bowl. Stir in salt and yeast mixture. Mix to form a soft dough. Turn onto a floured surface and knead for 5 minutes or until elastic.
Divide dough into 8. Put on a greased tray. Cover with a towel and stand in a warm place for 15 minutes or until expanded.
Combine feta, spinach, seasoning and chilli in a bowl. Roll each dough out to a 36x24cm rectangle. Divide spinach filling over rectangles. Fold dough over to enclose and press edges to seal.

Heat a frying pan over medium heat. Brush one side of each gozleme with oil. Add to pan, oiled-side down, and cook for 2-3 minutes or until golden. Brush uncooked side with oil and turn over. Cook for 2 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a plate. Serve gozleme with lemon wedges.
